meta.description: Creative names for all hybrid species. Key format: dominant_secondary
meta.naming_notes: Names blend parent species and hint at combined abilities

rhino_beetle_bombardier_beetle.name: Siege Beetle
rhino_beetle_bombardier_beetle.fantasy: An armored artillery platform that charges in and explodes

rhino_beetle_trap_jaw_ant.name: Hammerhorn
rhino_beetle_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Devastating charges with a skull-crushing snap at the end

rhino_beetle_leafcutter_ant.name: Bulldozer Beetle
rhino_beetle_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Clears paths and hauls twice its weight without slowing

rhino_beetle_diving_beetle.name: Ironback Swimmer
rhino_beetle_diving_beetle.fantasy: An aquatic tank that rams underwater obstacles

rhino_beetle_glowworm.name: Lantern Charger
rhino_beetle_glowworm.fantasy: A glowing battering ram that lights the way forward

rhino_beetle_assassin_bug.name: Ambush Rhino
rhino_beetle_assassin_bug.fantasy: Strikes from shadows with unstoppable force

rhino_beetle_dung_beetle.name: Titan Roller
rhino_beetle_dung_beetle.fantasy: Pushes boulders and enemies with equal ease

rhino_beetle_cicada.name: Thunder Beetle
rhino_beetle_cicada.fantasy: Charges with a deafening sonic boom

rhino_beetle_mantis.name: Jouster
rhino_beetle_mantis.fantasy: Precision charges that impale targets on contact

rhino_beetle_isopod.name: Armadillo Beetle
rhino_beetle_isopod.fantasy: Can curl into an indestructible ball and roll through enemies

bombardier_beetle_rhino_beetle.name: Mortar Tank
bombardier_beetle_rhino_beetle.fantasy: Heavy armor with explosive payload delivery

bombardier_beetle_trap_jaw_ant.name: Blastjaw
bombardier_beetle_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Chemical spray followed by a stunning snap

bombardier_beetle_leafcutter_ant.name: Fumigator
bombardier_beetle_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Sprays acid while allies gather resources safely

bombardier_beetle_glowworm.name: Flare Beetle
bombardier_beetle_glowworm.fantasy: Blinds enemies with burning chemical light

bombardier_beetle_dung_beetle.name: Stinkbomb Roller
bombardier_beetle_dung_beetle.fantasy: Rolls explosive payloads into enemy lines

bombardier_beetle_cicada.name: Screaming Bomber
bombardier_beetle_cicada.fantasy: Sonic distraction followed by chemical assault

bombardier_beetle_mantis.name: Chemical Assassin
bombardier_beetle_mantis.fantasy: Precision acid strikes that melt through armor

bombardier_beetle_isopod.name: Acid Pillbug
bombardier_beetle_isopod.fantasy: Rolls into a ball and sprays acid in all directions

trap_jaw_ant_rhino_beetle.name: Snaphorn
trap_jaw_ant_rhino_beetle.fantasy: Charges with jaws locked, releases on impact

trap_jaw_ant_bombardier_beetle.name: Blast Snapper
trap_jaw_ant_bombardier_beetle.fantasy: Jaw strike triggers explosive chemical reaction

trap_jaw_ant_leafcutter_ant.name: Harvestjaw
trap_jaw_ant_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Cuts through anything at lightning speed

trap_jaw_ant_diving_beetle.name: Reef Snapper
trap_jaw_ant_diving_beetle.fantasy: Underwater ambush predator with crushing jaws

trap_jaw_ant_glowworm.name: Flash Striker
trap_jaw_ant_glowworm.fantasy: Blinds with light, strikes in the confusion

trap_jaw_ant_assassin_bug.name: Silent Snap
trap_jaw_ant_assassin_bug.fantasy: No one hears the strike until it's too late

trap_jaw_ant_dung_beetle.name: Cracker Beetle
trap_jaw_ant_dung_beetle.fantasy: Crushes spherical objects with a single snap

trap_jaw_ant_cicada.name: Sonic Snapper
trap_jaw_ant_cicada.fantasy: Stuns with sound, finishes with jaws

trap_jaw_ant_mantis.name: Duelist
trap_jaw_ant_mantis.fantasy: Two lightning-fast strikes in perfect sequence

trap_jaw_ant_isopod.name: Coiled Striker
trap_jaw_ant_isopod.fantasy: Curls up, springs out with devastating jaw attack

leafcutter_ant_rhino_beetle.name: Harvest Tank
leafcutter_ant_rhino_beetle.fantasy: Armored resource gatherer that can't be stopped

leafcutter_ant_bombardier_beetle.name: Crop Duster
leafcutter_ant_bombardier_beetle.fantasy: Sprays beneficial chemicals that help allies

leafcutter_ant_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Harvests at incredible speed with precision cuts

leafcutter_ant_diving_beetle.fantasy: Harvests aquatic resources from underwater gardens

diving_beetle_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Efficient swimmer that ferries resources across water

diving_beetle_glowworm.name: Anglerfish Beetle
diving_beetle_glowworm.fantasy: Lures prey with bioluminescent glow underwater

diving_beetle_assassin_bug.name: Depth Lurker
diving_beetle_assassin_bug.fantasy: Silent predator in the deep, venomous strikes

diving_beetle_mantis.fantasy: Lightning reflexes adapted for aquatic strikes

diving_beetle_isopod.name: Nautilus Bug
diving_beetle_isopod.fantasy: Curls into a shell and drifts with the current

glowworm_rhino_beetle.name: Beacon Beetle

glowworm_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Attracts prey with light, strikes with jaws

glowworm_diving_beetle.fantasy: Glows in the deepest waters, revealing secrets

glowworm_assassin_bug.fantasy: Lures victims with hypnotic light, then strikes

glowworm_cicada.fantasy: Flashing lights synced with stunning sounds

glowworm_isopod.fantasy: A rolling ball of soft, comforting light

assassin_bug_rhino_beetle.name: Shadow Charger
assassin_bug_rhino_beetle.fantasy: Emerges from darkness with unstoppable momentum

assassin_bug_trap_jaw_ant.name: Ghost Striker
assassin_bug_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Never seen, only the snap of death

assassin_bug_glowworm.name: Dark Lantern
assassin_bug_glowworm.fantasy: Controls light and shadow to deceive prey

assassin_bug_dung_beetle.name: Night Navigator
assassin_bug_dung_beetle.fantasy: Finds its way in total darkness

assassin_bug_cicada.name: Silent Scream
assassin_bug_cicada.fantasy: Sound that only the target can hear

assassin_bug_mantis.name: Void Reaper
assassin_bug_mantis.fantasy: The ultimate ambush predator, instant death

dung_beetle_rhino_beetle.name: Boulder Pusher
dung_beetle_rhino_beetle.fantasy: Moves mountains one rock at a time

dung_beetle_trap_jaw_ant.name: Ball Breaker
dung_beetle_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Cracks open anything spherical with precision

dung_beetle_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Shapes and cultivates resources into perfect spheres

dung_beetle_glowworm.fantasy: Navigates by creating its own moonlight

dung_beetle_assassin_bug.name: Silent Mover
dung_beetle_assassin_bug.fantasy: Repositions objects without making a sound

dung_beetle_cicada.name: Rumble Roller
dung_beetle_cicada.fantasy: Rolls with a thunderous noise that disorients

cicada_rhino_beetle.name: War Horn
cicada_rhino_beetle.fantasy: Devastating charge announced by deafening call

cicada_bombardier_beetle.fantasy: Screaming dive followed by explosive impact

cicada_trap_jaw_ant.fantasy: Stuns with sound, closes with lethal speed

cicada_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Songs that coordinate team efforts perfectly

cicada_assassin_bug.fantasy: Ultrasonic calls only targets can hear

cicada_mantis.fantasy: Sonic distraction masks the killing blow

mantis_leafcutter_ant.fantasy: Cuts with medical precision, minimal waste

mantis_glowworm.fantasy: Refracts light into blinding, cutting beams

mantis_dung_beetle.name: Orbital Slicer
mantis_dung_beetle.fantasy: Cuts while rolling, impossible to predict

mantis_cicada.name: Sonic Scythe
mantis_cicada.fantasy: Sound waves guide the perfect strike
